author: FE Online
title: India Open 2017 Badminton Scores and Live Updates PV Sindhu vs Saina Nehwal Quater Final
text:
India Open 2017 Badminton Scores and Live Updates PV Sindhu vs Saina Nehwal Quater Final India Open 2017 Badminton Scores and Live Updates PV Sindhu vs Saina Nehwal Quater Final After a spectacular diplay of consistent performance as Rio Olympic silver medalist PV Sindhu and Saina Nehwal reach the quater finals of the India Open World Super Series, the two ace shuttlers are all set to face each other in the crucial clash. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: March 31, 2017 5:28 PM Rio Olympics silver medalist PV Sindhu (L) and ace Indian shuttler Saina Nehwal (R). (File Photo) 
After a spectacular diplay of consistent performance as Rio Olympic silver medalist PV Sindhu and Saina Nehwal reach the quater finals of the India Open World Super Series, the two ace shuttlers are all set to face each other in the crucial clash at the Siri Fort Sports Complex, today. While after a nail-biting 40 minutes-long second round clash Sindhu defeated Japanâ€™s Saena Kawakami to book her place in the last eight of the tournament, sixth-seed Saina outplayed Pompawee Chochuwong of Thailand 21-14, 21-11 within half an hour to storm into the quarter finals. This is the second crucial clash between Saina and Sindhu at international level after the last met at the dinal of the 2014 Syed Modi Grand Prix, where Sindhu got defeated by the London Olympics bronze-medallist.
